code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router';import tmdbApi from'../../api/tmdbApi';import apiConfig from'../../api/apiConfig';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CastList=props=>{const{category}=useParams();const[casts,setCasts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const getCredits=async()=>{const res=await tmdbApi.credits(category,props.id);setCasts(res.cast.slice(0,5));};getCredits();},[category,props.id]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"casts",children:casts.map((item,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"casts__item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"casts__item__img",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(apiConfig.w500Image(item.profile_path),")")}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"casts__item__name",children:item.name})]},i))});};export default CastList;
